Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: If you want I could walk you home.

Name: Bucketina-Chan
Story: No it's ok. I wouldn't want to bother you.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: It's not a bother at all Bucketina-Chan. I don't mind walking you home.

Name: Bucketina-Chan
Story: Oh ok if I won't be bothering you then I'd really like to walk with you.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: The poor girl looks so relieved now. Kinda glad my words helped her.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: It's a beautiful day outside! The birds are chirping and it isn't too cold out. Even if I wasn't taking her home I'd still probaby go for jog.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Oh shoot! I was so caught up with the whole key conversation that I had forgotten why I approached her in the first place.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Hey Bucketina-Chan I want to ask you something.

Name: Bucketina_Chan
Story: Y-yeah what's wrong Cursor-Kun?

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Do you have a date for the dance yet?

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Bucketina-Chan stops dead in her tracks. She looks down, avoiding eye contact with me.

Name: Bucketina-Chan
Story: No... N-no I don't.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Out of nowhere her cheeks grow much redder than I've ever seen them before.

Name: Bucketina_Chan
Story: To be honest Cursor-Kun... I uh... Really wanted to go with you.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: OH YEAH I'M IN!

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I really want that too Bucketina-Chan

Name: Bucketina-Chan
Story: You do!?

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Of course I do. Why wouldn't I? Your functionality is my all time favorite.

Name: Bucketina-Chan
Story: T-thank you Cursor-Kun... You're really sweet.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Yes! I scored a date for the pixel dance! That was a lot easier than I thought it would be.
